oai_dc:dc.dc:title: al- Farāʼiḍ al-Sirājīyah : manuscript, 1439
Sirājīyah
Farāʼiḍ al-Sirājīyah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sajāwandī, Sirāj al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad , active 12th century
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Muṣṭafá ibn Shams al-Dīn ibn Zakarīyā (copyist.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 5 lines per page, in black rubricated in red. Text surrounded by comments in the margins.
According to the colophon (f. 67r), copy completed in Muḥarram 843 AH [June/July 1439 AD] in the hand of Muṣṭafá ibn Shams al-Dīn ibn Zakarīyā.
With: Manẓūmah fī al-masāʼil al-mutashābihah min masāʼil al-farāʼiḍ ʻalá hayʼat asʼilah wa-ajwibah / min naẓm Yaḥyá ibn Abī Bakr al-Ḥanafī (ff. 67v-82v).
MS Arab 309. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Inheritance and succession (Islamic law)
Hanafites
